website_summaries.verdict: An affordable Advent calendar with super-cute Disney brand Tsum Tsum characters.
pros: The calendar is packed with a variety of adorable characters that can be stacked on one another
The limited edition toys offer a good value and come with plenty of accessories and headpieces to keep things fun each day a flap is opened

customer_reviews.title: Best advent calander I have come across!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 2 year old daughter who is absolutely tsum tsum crazy! We have tons of the plush ones and a handful of the ones that come in the mystery stack packs. I was looking for other tsum tsum stuff for her for birthday and Christmas and came across this! I can't wait to see how excited she is every day when she gets to open each door!
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift Ever
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable!! I actually bought this for my college age daughter who is away @ school!! Everyone still has a bit of kid in them @ xmas time so despite her age she was in love! Every day so far she has eagerly awaited opening a new door. She's already snapped me photos of each days new tsum tsum! Perfect gift for a stressed out "kid" so she can count the days until she is home sweet home awaiting Santas arrival!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine

customer_reviews.title: Got a duplicate and one has black scuff marks
customer_reviews.text: First of all, these seem to be mostly normal Tsum tsums with accsssories - that’s okay. But we got TWO Dales and one of them has a black scuff mark/sharpie(?) on it. Incredibly disappointing for my wife who is a big Chip & Dale fan. When she got her first she couldn’t wait for Chip! Well, Chip never came. Just this scuffed/marked up imposter Dale.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: A fun way to get into the Xmas spirit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old daughter, and am very happy with the purchase. I considered several other advent calendars, but chose this one because it has 24 windows vs some that only have 12; functional toys; and minimal choking hazards (we have 3 cats who like to knock small parts off tables, and a 1 year old who tries to chew on whatever is in reach). My daughter wanted to open every window right away, of course. Now the first thing she asks in the morning is if she can go open her advent calendar. I didn't even know about the Tsum Tsum line before seeing this advent calendar, but it's all really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Margot Junebug

customer_reviews.title: A great gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been loving opening this every day. All of the characters are classics (Mickey & gang, Bambi, Lady, etc.) so there's never a risk of finding an obscure, unknown character. They also all have some sort of holiday twist, like a scarf, Santa hat, etc. so any collector won't be doubling up. The accessories are cute too. Some of them included a Christmas train, an ornament, and a gingerbread sleigh that a medium-sized character pulls and a small-sized could ride in. Overall, I would absolutely say to buy this for any tsum tsum lover.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I really expected there would not be so many doubles.
customer_reviews.text: Starters, my daughter did like this. She really likes all the little characters, and they are all manufactured well. However, if you have ever had a tsum-tsum calendar in the past you can expect to get doubles on at least half. There were far to many of the same things in this one and other years calendars. Sadly actually. I really expected there would not be so many doubles.
customer_reviews.author: Us Moore

customer_reviews.title: They are all in there!
customer_reviews.text: Got this in the mail today. I very carefully opened the bottom to make sure all the characters were in there. Many other reviews warned there were empty days but I took a chance and it paid off! Now just waiting for Dec. 1st!
customer_reviews.author: Elle C.

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old twins loved this! Each morning they would wake up and rush downstairs to see what was in the next day. They'd also try to peek through the holes and sides to see what was in the next day. More than a month later, they're still playing with all the characters on a regular basis. We did not have any problems with missing pieces as others have posted. Great deal on so many Tsum Tsums and prefer this over a daily dose of chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: No Minnie Mouse!!! Received duplicate Mickey!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing to open up ANOTHER MICKEY MOUSE today. Every morning my daughter would say, "I love Minnie." I assumed we'd get a Minnie Mouse with a Disney advent calendar but instead we got our second Mickey Mouse today. The kids are super disappointed which disappoints me. We also found two characters in one container on a couple of occasions but I just pushed the character back into the correct spot so not a big deal. Seems to be cheaply made compared to last years calendar.
customer_reviews.author: DumbDumb

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!! Especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing!! Especially for the price! I expected the same size zsum zsums but you get all different sizes and accessories!! My daughter is 3 and absolutely loves it and I gotta be honest I find myself getting excited everyday when it's time to open a new one lol 😂. They are excellent quality and I love the variety!! Great product!! I definitely told all my family and friends about it and my daughter can't stop talking about it lol.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Even my 15 year old looked forward to opening a door every day!
customer_reviews.text: We used this countdown because we weren't home before Christmas. Since these are adorable Disney characters, it was the perfect way for the kids to count down while we were at Disney! My 2 took turns opening the little doors each day. The only issue is that some characters are girls, and my son does NOT want Elsa. So trading has gone on, which has caused a few arguments. Maybe I should have gotten 2!
customer_reviews.author: Alea Laughery

customer_reviews.title: Good but I would not get again!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -If you love Tsums this is a fun way to have some excitement each day in December. -You get a good number of tsums and some cute props to put them on. -You also get some accessories to put on the larger tsums which is nice. They don't have to be Christmas tsums year round. Cons: - I didn't like that all the small ones had glitter put on them. -can't really stack the tsums if you put the accessories on them (such as bows and hats for their heads) -order seemed really random? For some reason I expected some kind of tsum tsum christmas scene, but instead it's a hodgepodge of Christmas tsum tsum stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jun

customer_reviews.title: A brilliant advent calendar for everyone on your list.
customer_reviews.text: This is just TOO cute. It's a great holiday advent calendar that doubles as holiday decoration. I bought mine for the adults in the family (everyone loves the tsum tsum mobile game), it's a great idea, offering an alternative advent calendar without the ho hum candies that we've seen over and over. The toys are small (as expected) but there are great holiday themed pieces that are sooooo cute. For little kids beware of small pieces. Buy this for anyone, young and young at heart, it's just the cutest way to put yourself in the Christmas spirit.
customer_reviews.author: honorablebunny

customer_reviews.title: I would buy them again and recommend to anyone with children
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one for each of my daughters who are 6 and 8 years old. They were an absolute hit. Each door has a Tsum Tsum character behind it, or an accessory that the characters can use (for example, a Christmas wreath that fits around the character). The majority of the doors had actual Tsum Tsums behind them. My daughters were so excited to open the doors every day. These advent calendars were unique and most definitely worth every single penny. I would buy them again and recommend to anyone with children. There are small pieces so the product would not be appropriate for very young children.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to food advent - but only good for one year
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old is loving this! We don't do food advent calendars due to food allergies plus this is way more fun for the kids. My 5 year old loves Tsum Tsum's so this was perfect to get a 'blind' bag assortment one on each day to build out her collection that is holiday themed. She looks forward to it every morning. It would be great to have this set change themes or designs year after year though.
customer_reviews.author: Deena Cannistraci

customer_reviews.title: Tsum Tsum collector
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this after the holidays, but it doesn't matter because our girl wouldn't have the patience to only open one a day! lol In any case, the attached photo (with her doing her usual Archie Bunker raspberrries-lol) shows how great this toy is!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael FM

customer_reviews.title: Empty slots
customer_reviews.text: On the 15th day now and so far 2 slots have been empty! Really disappointed in product. Edited... 5 if the 24 slots were empty. My kids were really sad when they opened up empty doors, as was I.
customer_reviews.author: K Federico

customer_reviews.title: This was a wonderful change from the candy filled advent calendars that we ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a wonderful change from the candy filled advent calendars that we normally get. My daughter loved opening each day and seeing what fun characters she got. (I have to admit, I did too!) Sadly, we didn't get a little Stitch figure which is one we REALLY wanted but all of the characters were great and now she has lasting keepsakes from her advent calendar rather than cavities!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Wells

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was kinda pricey, but I eventually got it for my daughter. It woulda been fun to do at Christmas time, but it was more expensive then, and I wasn't sure I wanted to buy it. I ended up getting it as a random surprise for my 8 year old. Whenever she was good, I let her open one door as a reward. It was pretty fun for her (and me) and the toys ARE super cute. Definitely recommend for any time of year.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: duplicates and empty days
customer_reviews.text: My product may have been defected but there were days that were empty and many duplicate figures. My daughter was excited every morning to open this and then disappointment when it was empty or the same character. There was nowhere to ask for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn L Clark

customer_reviews.title: we have not started counting down yet, but I ...
customer_reviews.text: we have not started counting down yet, but I did watch a youtube video that showed me all the tsum tsum inside, and my son is SO EXCITED to start counting down to Christmas and adding these tsum tsum to his collection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but packaging mistakes
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute advent calendar, and my 4 year old loved it. It made waiting for Christmas much easier this year because he had something new to look forward to each day. I only gave it 3 stars because we got two sets of duplicate Tsum Tsums. There were also two days that two pieces in them, leaving two other days empty.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Fun advent treat.
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this advent calendar! He had fun opening each day and found that the items were worth opening! We have had calendars in the past that gave an accessory item that was useless until another day. This calendar was not that way at all! Any accessory items came with the play piece as well. So cute and even the sparkly characters amused my son!
customer_reviews.author: CrystalGSB

customer_reviews.title: GRANDDAUGHTER LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.text: My usually sophisticated 12 year old granddaughter requested this darling Tsum Tsum Advent calendar and since I encourage enjoying childhood I bought it for her. She was so delighted when it arrived and sends me a video each day when she opens each one (even though I only live a few blocks away). It really is a hit and makes me smile at her enjoyment. Merry Christmas to all!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: So fun & interactive
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest calendar!! My 2 1/2 year old absolutely loves her "people", as she calls them. So fun & interactive...she carries her friends with her everywhere she goes. If I had one complaint it's that the box keeps flipping forward & closing since its top heavy. Just put something with some weight on the flat part to help hold it up. That's it! I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Cute and a great value too!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the most adorable advent calendar! My family are huge Disney fans and Tsum Tsums, of course. As December 1st approaches and the countdown to Christmas becgins, I can only imagine how exciting it will be for kids to open such a mini Tsum Tsum surprise each day. Although this is more expensive than typical advent calendars which have chocolate treats, I feel this is a great value for so many limited edition Tsum Tsums.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel M

customer_reviews.title: Several duplicates disppointing.
customer_reviews.text: This is only day 12 and we've already had theee duplicates. That's pretty ridiculous given how many Tsums there are.
customer_reviews.author: MSanders

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: We loved this! I had read the other reviews and ordered it despite knowing we might be missing some pieces. Nothing was missing and everything was perfect. We loved opening a box each day and getting a cute Disney character. I wish every day of the month was a Disney character, but oh well. The presents and star and Christmas tree were fine and just made the next day even better.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great Advent Calendar for Tsum Tsum lovers
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Tsum Tsums and this was great that she got something new every day for over 3 weeks. I would buy this again in a heart beat next year if they changed the things inside. I think they should come out with a birthday themed one you could give a child leading up to their birthday Heaven knows there is enough of this little guys to do so. It was just something fun she looked forward each day and a reason to be good and listen so she could open a new box each night.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jenni

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 4 year old son who likes to play with hatchimals. He is on day 8 of opening this advent calendar. My son loves all the little characters and accessories. I wish I had gotten it at a better price but we are happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lupo

customer_reviews.title: I am a really bad mom and let him open the rest today
customer_reviews.text: My son went totally nuts when he opened the first seven days to catch up. I am a really bad mom and let him open the rest today. They are so damn adorable and it was packaged nicely. BTW, my son is nine, loves Disney, and I was really worried these would not interest him since he seemed older than the other ages of the kids enjoying this. Well, you are never too old. And the best part is that there are so many classic Disney characters. I won't spoil it for everyone. This was so much better than the LEGO advent calendars I have given him in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Dairy Donna

customer_reviews.title: for someone who is really hard to get up in the morning for school this thing has proved to be a great motivator. Plus the toys
customer_reviews.text: My kid is so far on day 9 and loves this, for someone who is really hard to get up in the morning for school this thing has proved to be a great motivator. Plus the toys that are in there are adorable. The only things I had issues with was 1, When getting the tape off to open that front flap it tore the cardboard right off in big chunks. So its now a Frankenstein of its former self. 2. The second thing that I found wrong with the calendar was sadly not all the days had toys in them, though I'm pretty sure there was suppose to be. Over all my daughter loves the calendar..
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Best Advent calendar ever for Tsum Tsum fans!
customer_reviews.text: My kids were super excited that their Elf on the Shelf brought this to them Dec 1st. They had so much fun opening a new door each day! They are super Tsum Tsum fans so it was very exciting for them. The only thing we didn't understand about this was that there is no door for day 25. I just had to explain to my kids that it's probably because on the 25th they get presents from Santa and family. It'll be hard for the Elf to top this one next year!
customer_reviews.author: sodagirl

customer_reviews.title: It was heartbreaking to see how sad on those days
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old daughter because it was different from the traditional chocolate advent calendars. It was disappointing that it didnt arrive on time and on top of that, some of the numbers that she opened had nothing inside. It was heartbreaking to see how sad on those days! I would not recommend spending this much and buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Maria N.

customer_reviews.title: great but missing day 2
customer_reviews.text: i love it!!!!!!!!! this is so cute its no plush tsum tsum advent calendar but this one is 1000x more affordable which i appreciate. this comes with actually so many things so the price is pretty great. it wouldve been all 5 stars but when i opened day 2, it was empty!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch!!
customer_reviews.text: Furious!!! I bought this last December (2017) for this coming Christmas (2018) so I just opened it. IT IS NOT THE SAME ONE AS ADVERTISED. I already have this one! This is NOT the one I paid for and received. SO MAD!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old was so excited. He looks forward to his advent calendar every year. He could see that day 2 was a big prize and couldn’t WAIT to open it. Well- day 2 came and he opened it up to find NOTHING inside!! Now if I return it he’ll have no advent calendar but how many other days will be empty??????? Hopefully no more empty slots. We’ll see.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: For $29.96 this countdown has quite a bit of pieces inside. Not to mention, my daughter absolutely loves opening a new door every morning. I have not had to tell her to wake up more than once in the morning ever since December 1st. She looks forward to waking up so she can open a new prize. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, we loved them
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, we loved them, the figures are kind of rubber on the outside which makes them nice to grip. The only thing is some of the pieces are awfully small and I'm not sure exactly why. I can totally understand the mouse (from Cinderella) being tiny but why is Ariel from the little mermaid? Didn't seem to affect the kids but I did find myself trying to keep the small pieces together a bit exhausting.
customer_reviews.author: TB 113

customer_reviews.title: All the other days so far have had something in it and they are adorable and my daughter loves them but it’s very upsetting ...
customer_reviews.text: It Missing at least one piece! We are on day nine of our count to Christmas and when my daughter opened today’s door there was nothing! All the other days so far have had something in it and they are adorable and my daughter loves them but it’s very upsetting that pieces are missing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s disney
customer_reviews.text: This was the most important had to have advent calendar this year. It will be loved!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Cute Disney Characters
customer_reviews.text: The tsum tsum characters and accessory are cute plastic pieces. It would be nice though if the price were more compatible to other advent calendars.
customer_reviews.author: Rose L

customer_reviews.title: Price I paid was well worth it the joy she got from it
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit for my daughter this past Christmas! She just loves Tsum Tusm's and was SO excited every morning to open a door to find her new Tsum Tsum. She is four so it also helped learning to count backwards. The toys themselves are well made. Price I paid was well worth it the joy she got from it. I will definitely be buying another one for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony

customer_reviews.title: Good value - fun tsums most days
customer_reviews.text: Super fun for all of advent. Cute tsums of different characters for each day - only negative is that a few of the days are accessories, not actual tsums - but this is kind of fun as you can use them with your tsums. Good value for the money and fun for all ages (except super little ones who might eat a tsum, they could choke on the small ones)...
customer_reviews.author: kindleuser

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little advent calendar. SO cute, especially since Tsum Tsums are the thing in our house right now. We normally do the Lego calendar so this is a nice change that we will enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Kogie

customer_reviews.title: Great advent activity for kiddos!
customer_reviews.text: My 2-year old LOVED having this to open every day in December! She also has continued to enjoy playing with the figurines. It's hard to open the doors (and get some of the baggies out)... so for a young kiddo, it definitely takes adult supervision to complete the calendar.
customer_reviews.author: Jedberg

customer_reviews.title: This advent calendar has been so much fun for my 6-year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: This advent calendar has been so much fun for my 6-year old daughter! She loves taking out the characters each day, and all of the accessories are just too cute. I love that we'll get to keep them all around for Christmas decorations to come in the future years too!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 3 year old. Only flaw is that it was missing one small Tsum Tsum - the space behind Day 7 was empty. Docking a star because of her disappointment. Otherwise, the toys are adorable and she loves the excitement of a new surprise every day.
customer_reviews.author: ksmack

customer_reviews.title: Nothing behind door 2!
customer_reviews.text: This calendar has been the joy of my daughter's mornings until this morning. Two days away from Christmas, but when we open the door....there is nothing there! My daughter was extremely upset and being that it was one of the bigger doors, I'd say we got ripped off. Completely disappointed in this.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, but didn't realize until after we opened every ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, but didn't realize until after we opened every door that seller sent the wrong set. Wanted gingerbread house set shown and received one that shows ski lift. As such it didn't contain the same figures and we didn't get the little Anna and Elsa from Frozen which were highly desired. Super cute product, but beware, you may not get the pictured item.
customer_reviews.author: N. Cure

customer_reviews.title: Not that great.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these and my girls loved them. However, they weren't really made that great. Maybe it was due to shipping but a few of the numbers didn't have a toy inside them because they had managed to slip into another slot below. So there I was on day with one daughter thinking she was snubbed. lol.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Yao

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to count down to christmas!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely LOVES this advent calender! She is actually more excited to open the next days door and see what character she gets than she is for Christmas!! Very cute characters and lots of variety of sizes and types. Would for sure buy again for another child or as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C

customer_reviews.title: Missing tsum tsums, empty doors! 😢
customer_reviews.text: what a disappointment! There are doors on my daughters advent calendar that open to nothing! Empty! That's aweful and from other reviews it's a common occurance. The person in charge of quality control must be sleeping on the job! Where are the tsum tsums? 😢
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Mahouski

customer_reviews.title: Have not opened yet, and will update when we ...
customer_reviews.text: Have not opened yet, and will update when we do. I got this as a gift for my daughter. The box wasn't damaged and everything seems to be intact. I am excited for her to be able to open this and have a surprise everyday in the month of December!
customer_reviews.author: brynn anderson

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. I have got an advent calendar for my daughter every year since she was 5 or 6. She is 16 now and we still enjoy these. This one is super cute with a Disney theme and very cute tsum tsum characters.
customer_reviews.author: JennyI

customer_reviews.title: 4 YO LOVED This.
customer_reviews.text: 4yo loved this. Looked forward to it every morning. There was one cell empty, kinda weird, but she got over that pretty quickly. Hoping I can find something like this yet a different set next year.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Saving for next christmas and hoping to buy all sets.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Family

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Calendar
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year-old twin granddaughters LOVED this product because the characters are "cool, stackable, fun, and cute." The twins also used calendar as playhouse. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Gammie

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: This was our first year doing Advent calendars, and this one was a hit! Most of the others I found were Lego or chocolate, but I love that it has no assembly required, so great for kids of any age!
customer_reviews.author: Shoppin' mommy from TX

customer_reviews.title: Better than chocolate advent calendars
customer_reviews.text: My daughters loved opening the tsum tsums each day. There was a nice variety of 3 different sized recognizable disney figures plus several add on fun pieces such as a train, a chair and a wreath. The figures stack or fit in the additional pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old requested this for this year's calendar. It was hard to find, and I hesitated to pay this much, but it was worth it. The calendar is cute and the figures are adorable. Many of them have interchangeable pieces. She will play with them for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: SweetBaboo

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. My children and I play the game and love anything Disney. I did have any empty box but I think it might of just got pushed into another box because one had two. I do like the extra pieces but wish they could include a Tsum Tsum for each day even if its just a very small one. Definitely going to keep this for years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Latesha Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Advent calendar for a Disney fan
customer_reviews.text: My youngest daughter has always wanted an advent calendar, so when I saw this one, I knew it was time to relent. So adorable. Exactly as pictured. She's going out of town so she opened 3 doors today. She was so excited over the darling Bambi and can't wait to open more.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cute little toys
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 6 year old daughter - we're on Day 1 - cute little well made toy inside - she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but she LOVED the tsum tsums
customer_reviews.text: We had given my daughter Lego advent calendars in the past, but she is really into tsum tsums now. She's 11 and I wondered if this would be too young for her, but she LOVED the tsum tsums! They're very cute, different sizes and stack on top of one another. Now that Christmas is over she is still using the tsum tsums to decorate her desk and room. This was a great find for her. Highly recommend for tsum tsum lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great, high quality advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic advent calendar. The quality is great. The variety of Tsum Tsum's is good--different sizes/characters, some with added hats, accessories, sparkles, a cool train. We are not done with it yet, but I highly recommend this. My daughter is 11 years old and loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Emmies Mom

customer_reviews.title: ... so excited to use this and it will be fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: This won’t be opens until around Christmas time but we are so excited to use this and it will be fun for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Somers

customer_reviews.title: Really neat!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! I know they are pricey, but it's so nice to have something to look forward to every night. We can't wait to see what's coming next. They are so adorable and there are a lot of characters with accessories, plus other stackable items. It's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen H.

customer_reviews.title: Risk of a disappointment because some pieces get lost in the box
customer_reviews.text: We really liked this, but one of the days was entirely empty and we had to take the thing apart Christmas Eve to find the missing piece. The Tsum Tsums are adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Smith

customer_reviews.title: These are adorable! We got this set for our son to ...
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable! We got this set for our son to play with next year and it is really cute! If you like Disney and/or Tsum tsum then this is a great Advent calendar
customer_reviews.author: Curly Girl

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (5 yo) was over the moon when this got here. Just in time to start opening the doors. It's more sturdy than I expected. She uses it to play with the surprises she gets. I would definitely recommend it to anyone with a Tsum Tsum fan in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Really cute idea and great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really cute idea and great for the price. Received on time. Item was crushes on the top so I had to tape it up. Package was fine just item was damaged. Contents still intact just looks crushed.
customer_reviews.author: CBag

customer_reviews.title: but my kids were disappointed to receive exact duplicates on a few of the ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very cute advent set, but my kids were disappointed to receive exact duplicates on a few of the figures. If that was a possibility I think it should have been mentioned in the description. From the description it seems as if everyday would be a different character or accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Cutest advent calendar!! Every day there's a new ...
customer_reviews.text: Cutest advent calendar !! Every day there's a new Christmas themed tsum tsum to open. This really helped my four year old endure the long wait until Christmas !!
customer_reviews.author: Pekkybrown

customer_reviews.title: My daughter has opened the hole at 12/14, there ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has opened the hole at 12/14, there was a train toy but got wrong parts of wheels as these photos. I didn't find the button to feedback this issue. So I putted on there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We are on day 9 and my children love this advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: We are on day 9 and my children love this advent calendar! The tsum tsums are so cute and so is the house... FYI be very careful opening it as there is a bunch of tape and the cover becomes the floor when opened up so don't rip it off!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Charge

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Fun
customer_reviews.text: Love! My 4 year old had so much fun opening this each day leading up to Christmas. I attached a picture of what all we got, if you want to see.
customer_reviews.author: S., Panda

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy they have duplicates in the boxes
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy that my child received duplicate tsum tsums in this box. Don't buy it. So far received 2 mermaids and 2 cats.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Missing items behind doors
customer_reviews.text: My kids have opened 2 doors (so far) that have been empty. If course there's no way to have it replaced or refunded. Pretty crappy as my kids have been looking forward to this SO MUCH every day. Needless to say, I have some pretty disappointed kids.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for the kids. I didn't have problems like others with empty boxes. Instead there was a fun toy in each slot. One thing I really like is that each slot has a great little toy my kids love. Great Christmas buildup fun.
customer_reviews.author: Teh-Wei Doo

customer_reviews.title: Missing Tsum Tsum ☹️
customer_reviews.text: My kids love Tsum Tsum's and were so excited to see I bought this for them. I wanted to give this more stars. However, when they went to open today's door it was empty. They were so sad and disappointed. I considered returning it but then I'd have to wait for another one and figured it wasn't worth it. I just hope there are no more empty days.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old daughter loved this so much
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter loved this so much! I just wish there weren't so many pictures of the toys on the outside of the box. It was not so much a surprise anymore when they know what they are getting.
customer_reviews.author: tomozy

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is beyond thrilled with this. The toys are cute and she is so excited each day to get to find out what character or accessory she will get next.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great but missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Calendar is a lot of fun but we were missing the piece for day 3. Opened up the whole thing to make sure it hadn’t gotten doubled up with another day. We are now one short. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Missing figure
customer_reviews.text: One of the slots was missing a figure, unfortunately it was a big tsum tsum. The item came sealed and new, so I guess it was a manufacturer error. Reading the reviews looks like it's a pretty common mistake. What a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: SMC

customer_reviews.title: My 12 year old daughter liked opening the doors up on the day for them ...
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter liked opening the doors up on the day for them to be opened. It was like getting a little early Christmas present every day.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Missing toys
customer_reviews.text: This was the first advent calendar we have bought our child. Imagine her disappointment when on her very first day there was no toy!! My husband opened the package and fortunately it is only missing the one toy. It was a serious disappointing way to start an advent calendar.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our Elf on the Shelf brought this back from the North Pole for our son to help countdown until Christmas! HE LOVES IT! Everyday he gets excited to open the new door and see who's inside! He also plays with it they way it's pictured which surprised me... he also puts all of the little characters back into their "home" each night! It's cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its great
customer_reviews.text: Very popular this year. Quality toys and lots of fun
customer_reviews.author: chris schindler

customer_reviews.title: Super cute so far
customer_reviews.text: Super cute so far. All sorts of disney characters decked out for Christmas. Some of the doors only have a little sleigh or package for them to sit on, but you get Tsum Tsums before those doors are supposed to be opened. Plus all the tiniest Tsum Tsums are sparkly on the top!
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoyed counting down the days till Christmas with this cute Disney Tsum Tsum calendar. It was fun seeing which character we would get each day.
customer_reviews.author: C logden

customer_reviews.title: We looked forward to opening one every night. If ...
customer_reviews.text: We looked forward to opening one every night. If there is another Tsum Tsum one available next year, we will totally get it.
customer_reviews.author: Chiropteran

customer_reviews.title: Count down
customer_reviews.text: My kids enjoyed this at Christmas and now have a cute tsum tsum collection.
customer_reviews.author: gentry scott

customer_reviews.title: 24 Days of surprises and enjoyment.
customer_reviews.text: If your child enjoys Tsum Tsum, this advent calendar is perfect. My daughter loved it and couldn't wait to open the next day's surprise. A lot more for the price then I expected, as these fugures can be expensive.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just wonderful!! Little toys are so cute!! And I was looking for a calendar without candies.
customer_reviews.author: Fisherwomen

customer_reviews.title: Fun for any Disney lover.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and my kids love to do it We get together before bedtime each night and they take turns opening a door. It's one of the better countdown calendars. No messy gross chocolate and at the end you have these lovely little toys. We bring out our old sets each year when we start a new calendar.
customer_reviews.author: Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Some parts missing
customer_reviews.text: My kids were so excited yesterday to open box #1, but then were disappointed today as there was nothing in box #2. Was this a default of the product? Or are there some boxes with nothing in it? Either way, VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: wildvirgo

customer_reviews.title: Great price quality and service!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! My daughter is 6 and loves opening blind bags and blind boxes (if you have a child that is under 12 you will understand what these are all too well!), and this is so perfect for that! High quality toys and great price! Bonus is you get to use the Tsums for a Christmas decoration! Fast shipping even though it was out of stock when I ordered it. Wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Brawley

customer_reviews.title: Holiday tsum tsums
customer_reviews.text: Cute advent calendar but watch out for overinflated list price. The list price changed with each seller as did the price. I've never seen that happen before but the calendar is not worth the higher pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Alleyson

customer_reviews.title: Got 2 repeats
customer_reviews.text: My son has been super excited with this we have gotten 2 (Ariel’s) and 2 (Elsa’s) which is a little disappointing other then that it’s cute
customer_reviews.author: Green Bean

product_meta.title: Tsum Tsum Disney Countdown to Christmas Advent Calendar [2016]
product_meta.description: Enjoy counting down the 24 days until Christmas with the Disney Tsum Tsum Advent Calendar. Open a new window each day to reveal a surprise Tsum Tsum figure or accessory and create a Gingerbread themed scene. There are 18 Tsum Tsum figures, 6 large, 6 medium in holiday attire, and 6 small, as well as 6 holiday themed accessories, and 6 seasonal head pieces in a Gingerbread House themed package. Each holiday accessory is stackable and can be used to stack a large, medium and small Tsum Tsum figure on its own or used to build out an even taller stack with other accessories; Head pieces fit on each large Tsum Tsum figure for the perfect holiday decoration. Collect, stack and display your favorite holiday themed Disney Tsum Tsum characters; Some assembly may be required. Ages 6Plus.
feature_bullets: Enjoy counting down the 24 days until Christmas
Open a new window each day to reveal a surprise
Includes 18 Tsum Tsum figures, 6 large, 6 medium and 6 small in holiday attire
It also comes with 6 holiday themed accessories, and 6 seasonal head pieces
Collect, stack and display your favorite holiday themed Disney Tsum Tsum characters

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars574 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
